# forge-vhdl: Multi-Tenant VHDL Development

**Version:** 3.3.0-multi-tenant
**Purpose:** Tool-neutral entry point for AI-assisted VHDL development
**Supports:** Claude, GitHub Copilot, Cursor

## Quick Navigation

## Repository Structure

```
vhdl/               # VHDL components & packages
cocotb_tests/       # Progressive test suite (P1/P2/P3)
workflow/           # Requirements & specifications
docs/               # Technical standards & guides
.claude/            # Shared agent infrastructure
```

## Core Components

**Utilities:**
- forge_util_clk_divider - Clock division
- forge_hierarchical_encoder - FSM debugging

**Voltage Packages:**
- forge_voltage_3v3_pkg - TTL/GPIO (0-3.3V)
- forge_voltage_5v0_pkg - Sensor supply (0-5V)
- forge_voltage_5v_bipolar_pkg - Moku DAC/ADC (±5V)

**Testing:**
- P1: 2-4 tests, <20 lines output
- P2: 5-10 tests, <50 lines output
- P3: 15-25 tests, <100 lines output

## Key Workflows

All tools support:
1. AI-First Requirements (2-5 min)
2. Engineer Requirements (15-30 min)
3. 3-Agent Workflow (generate → design → test)

Implementation varies by tool - see tool-specific guides.

## Common Commands

```bash
# Environment detection
uv run python .claude/env_detect.py

# Run tests
uv run python cocotb_tests/run.py <component>

# List components
ls vhdl/components/utilities/
```
